channel.title: Shop help! PLZ!
channel.description:
In pimpscape I cant make a shop menu come up when i trade/talk to a ghost shopkeeper. :mad: I have put this into my client.java[code] else if (NPCID == 1699) { // pure/pk shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; }[/code]
And I have put this into my Shops.cfg[code]shop = 42 Pure/Pk_shop 2 2 4151 50 6585 20 6568 20 4214 50 1131 100 2497 100 2491 100 2581 20 2577 20 861 500 892 50000000 5698 5000 4587 5000 1305 5000 5575 50 5576 50 5574 50 3842 1000 3840 1000 3844 1000 2446 10000000 2440 10000000 2442 10000000 2436 10000000 2444 10000000 391 200000000 397 200000000 385 200000000[/code]
What am I missing? :confused:
Plz I need help ASAP! :(

ooh well if u want the npc code open your npc.cfg and Ctrl + F and type the name in

npc = 1699	Ghost_Shopkeeper

In pimpscape I cant make a shop menu come up
when i trade/talk to a ghost shopkeeper.
:mad:
I have put this into my client.java else if (NPCID == 1699) { // pure/pk shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 42; }
